channel.title: How would I
channel.description:
How would I make a "if(IsInEXAMPLE){"
Type of command, Where you cannot use magic in "EXAMPLE"
I know how to make the "IsIn" method with the coords etc..
I just don't know how to make it so people can't use magic in the specific place.

item.title: How would I
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote="`ExiledScape, post:3, topic:278166"][quote author=dragonchain link=topic=367149.msg2781850#msg2781850 date=1242038676]
Use the teleblock method, it works.
[/quote]

that stops them from TELEING… i don’t want them doing any spells >_>[/quote] I said use the same method, just make it so they can tele after there out of the IsIn

Read full topic
